# Summary

This report compiles exploratory diagnostics for the baseline EIF-only data:

- Flow matrix summaries by issue area
- PCA scree plots and loadings
- Participation time series for selected countries

# Figures

```{r figures, results='asis'}
figs <- list.files("figures", pattern = "\\.png$", full.names = TRUE)
figs <- sort(figs)
for (i in seq_along(figs)) {
  cat(sprintf("\n\n**Figure %d.** %s\n\n", i, basename(figs[i])))
  cat(sprintf("![](%s)\n", figs[i]))
}
```

# Tables

```{r tables, results='asis'}
flow <- readr::read_csv("flow_summary.csv", show_col_types = FALSE)
cat("\n\n**Table 1.** Flow matrix summary by issue area.\n\n")
knitr::kable(flow)
```
